desc.cn: 该图标表明当前蚀刻章可被重锻，重锻方式如图鉴所示。
desc.en: Medals with such icons can be reforged. Follow the steps in the Medal Album to reforge them.

desc.cn: 重锻后，蚀刻章等级和外观会发生改变。
desc.en: Reforging the engraved medal changes its level and appearance.

desc.cn: 该图标表明当前蚀刻章可被镀层，镀层方式如图鉴所示。
desc.en: Medals with such icons can be trimmed. Follow the steps in the Medal Album to trim them.

desc.cn: 镀层后，蚀刻章外观会发生改变。
desc.en: Trimming the engraved medal changes its appearance.

desc.cn: 此图标代表该蚀刻章可被激活止境认证，仅部分高珍贵度蚀刻章具备激活资格。
desc.en: Medals with such icons can undergo Verification of Finality. This is only available to a number of rare medals.

desc.cn: 在限定期间达成该蚀刻章重锻方式Ⅲ时，即可激活止境认证。
desc.en: Complete Reforging Ⅲ of the engraved medal to verify Finality

desc.cn: 若后续新增更高珍贵度的蚀刻章，该蚀刻章的止境认证资格将被永久解除并移至新蚀刻章。
desc.en: If engraved medals of higher rarities are added in the future, the Verification of Finality of the medal will be permanently removed and transferred to the new medal instead.

desc.cn: 新蚀刻章重新达成重锻方式Ⅲ后，方可再次激活止境认证。
desc.en: Complete Reforging Ⅲ of the new engraved medal to re-verify its Finality.

desc.cn:
通过装备精锻系统，可提升金色品质装备的各项初始属性。
精锻成功后，将固定提升属性数值。每项属性都有精锻强化成功次数上限。
desc.en:
Use Gear Artificing to improve various base stats of gold-quality gear. 
Successful artificing provides a fixed increase to the stats. Every stat has a limit to the number of successful artificing attempts.

desc.cn: 每次装备精锻需耗费<@gd.key>金色品质装备</>和<@gd.key>装备精锻助剂</>。
desc.en: Each artificing attempt costs <@gd.key>gold-quality gear</> and <@gd.key>gear artificing catalyst</>.

desc.cn: 装备精锻助剂的所属地区必须与待精锻装备相同。管理员可在各<@gd.key>地区调度员</>处兑换装备精锻助剂。
desc.en: There are different regional Gear Artificing Catalysts and they must match the region of the gear to be artificed. Purchase the catalysts from various <@gd.key>regional stock redistributors</>.

desc.cn: 当装备作为精锻耗费材料时，必须与待精锻装备<@gd.key>所属部位类型</>相同。
desc.en: The gear used as the artificing material must share the <@gd.key>type (armor, gloves, or kits)</> of the target gear to be artificed. For example, only armor can be used to artifice another armor.

desc.cn: 当装备作为精锻耗费材料时，该装备必须<@gd.key>含有待精锻属性</>，且该属性未强化前的初始值<@gd.key>不小于</>待精锻装备对应属性的初始值。
desc.en: The gear to be spent for artificing must have <@gd.key>artifice-able stats</>, and the base value (pre-artificing) of such stats <@gd.key>cannot be smaller</> than those of the gear to be artificed.

desc.cn:
每次对装备属性进行精锻时，将积累精锻进度，积累达到上限时，下一次该装备属性精锻强化将<@gd.key>必定成功</>。
不同装备和属性的精锻积累上限略有不同。
desc.en: Performing gear artificing of a particular gear stat builds up artificing progress. Reaching the progress limit <@gd.key>guarantees success</> for the next artificing attempt of this gear stat. Different gear and gear stats have different artificing progress limits.

desc.cn:
装备精锻有较小可能直接强化成功，且清空当前精锻积累。
耗费装备的属性初始值<@gd.key>高于</>待精锻装备初始值时，直接完成精锻强化的可能性略有<@gd.key>提升</>。
desc.en: Gear artificing attempts have a small chance of direct success. A successful attempt also resets the current artificing progress. Chance of direct success is slightly <@gd.key>improved</> when the gear used as the artificing material has <@gd.key>higher</> base stats than those of the gear to be artificed.

desc.cn:
谷地像差中有着大量未知的秘宝，同时也有着足以危及性命的紊乱环境，在其中会不断增长紊乱值。 
管理员需要在紊乱值达到临界前，尽可能搜集更多的物品。
desc.en:
Numerous unknown secrets and valuables exist within the Valley's Aberrants, but ambient Derangement is extremely hazardous and will increase with time.
Endministrator, try to collect as many items as possible before Derangement reaches its limit.

desc.cn:
在谷地像差中，存在大量沉积晶石，将其破坏后会暴露其核心，与之交互可获得沉积结核。
也可与各种储物点交互获得沉积具象物。
但需注意，这些行为都会使紊乱值增长。
desc.en:
Many Precipitation Crystals exist in Valley's Aberrants. Smash the crystal to expose its core, then interact with it to get precipitation nodules.
Interact with various storage points to acquire precipitation manifests.
Be careful, though. These actions will cause Derangement to increase.

desc.cn:
探索中获得的沉积结核会保存在隔绝封装器中。
隔绝封装器具有一定的容量上限，达到上限时，便无法获得更多沉积结核。
desc.en:
Precipitation nodules found during exploration are stored in the Isolation Container.
The Isolation Container has a limited capacity and cannot hold more precipitation nodules when full.

desc.cn:
谷地像差中存在各种敌人，有些资源需要击败看守的敌人后才能获得。
在战斗中，会额外持续增长紊乱值。
desc.en:
There are all sorts of enemies in the Valley's Aberrants. Some enemies must be first defeated to acquire certain resources.
Fighting battles will also cause Derangement to increase.

desc.cn: 完成阿奎多发布的各类委托，可以获得奖励，并可解锁辅助探测技术，提升在谷地像差中的探索能力。
desc.en: Complete Aquito's commissions to earn rewards and unlock exploration support tech. These tech will make exploration easier in the Valley's Aberrants.

desc.cn: 通过带出沉积结核或是完成某些委托，可以积累行动刻度，进而获得奖励，请记得领取。
desc.en: Earn operation metrics and rewards by successfully bringing out precipitation nodules or completing certain commissions. Don't forget to claim them.
